angstd.ui.views.view.manager
Class DefaultSelectionManager<C extends ViewComponent>

java.lang.Object
  angstd.ui.views.view.manager.DefaultViewManager
      angstd.ui.views.view.manager.DefaultSelectionManager<C>
Type Parameters:
C -
All Implemented Interfaces:
SelectionManager<C>, ViewManager
public class DefaultSelectionManager<C extends ViewComponent>
extends DefaultViewManager
implements SelectionManager<C>

Basic implementation of the SelectionManager interface. This class provides the functionalities for a selection manager for ViewComponents.

MouseOver selection, Clicked component selection and a general selection pool are provided and can be manipulated.

For further details see SelectionManager.

Author:
Andreas Held
See Also:
SelectionManager
